mapper.insert: insert into board(member_id, title, date, views, thumbsup, url, item_name, price, delivery_price, category, content) values(#{memberId}, #{title}, #{date}, #{views}, #{thumbsup}, #{url}, #{itemName}, #{price}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{category}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set views=views+1 where board_id=#{boardId}
